Bassin' with Bob.knownFor: “ Best Bass Fishing in the West ” Reviewed October 6, 2014 I have fished for fresh water bass (largemouth and smallmouth) from Maine to California - and around the U.S. for more than 40 years. Fishing with pro guide, Bob Myskey on Clear Lake is the best! For more than 8 years, we have fished around the calendar on Clear Lake with Bob. It's the perfect combination for a successful trip...
